name: FRAGMENTED (itch) (ImsomniacDX)
description:
FRAGMENTED is a RPG Earthbound-like taking place in 201X, involving a single kid trying to stop a series of weird occurrences  on the country of Merryland.

The kid in question? Meet Rein!

Rein is a kid with a lot of time to spare, currently living alone since his parents are on a business trip. Rein is a socially awkward kid who altough doesnt do well in conversations, is very energetic and an overall nice person to be around.

FEATURES:

  1. Aesthetic similar to Earthbound;
  2. More then 10 towns to explore;
  3. Emotional backstories;
  4. Gameplay being a mix of animal crossing with, you guessed it, Earthbound;
  5. Lots, AND LOTS of purple.

(NOTE: This is made for the Game Mockup Jam and is probally not going to be a real game anytime soon, clicking download will make you download the "games" assets)
